title: Champion I hate with a passion
body:
Champion I wish they were Deleted

1. {{champion:26}} The stupidest champion in my opinion, AOE stun, revive, and not to mention he remove 98% of your movement speed, but he can also speed himself up too.
2. {{champion:7}} In my opinion highest burst, the safest assassin in the game, and can kill anyone in lane with Q,W,R,E and ignite, sometime you might not need the ignite.
3. {{champion:13}} Why isn't his root a skill shot?
4. {{champion:117}} Her CC is stupidly annoying
5. {{champion:164}} Seriously don't know what is this, a tank or assassin?

replies.body: {{champion:240}} He'll destroy you in lane, and have fun doing it.
Every champion that kills me or denies me kills is annoying.

{{champion:39}} with her Q resets and her E hit box , I'd even rather deal with a Yasuo when it comes to dashing around minions

{{champion:105}} poke the shit out of him , get a little minion aggro , lose 20% of your HP , deny him from cs as much as you want , lvl 6 and you dead 

{{champion:412}} " Dodged his Q" wait why am I hooked ? wait Thresh Stop , what did I do ? the only thing I know that I'm getting grabbed to death and there is no run , also his W is annoying and his Ult is basically a root for you if you are immobile and got no flash

{{champion:154}} Why he has so much cc/damage/tankiness ? Idc if he is weak or low win rate , I hate him and I will always will

{{champion:33}} You playing good ? wait let me press E on you

And all ranged Top laners

{{champion:63}} 

We already have atleast 4 {{summoner:14}} per game, and hes the mascot for kill lane supports that take ignite.
I hate any that are part of the reason why there's getting to be way too much stealth, invulnerability, and dashing halfway across the map in the game.
